content: crochet hearts motif 1 http //www etsy com/shop/lubadaviesatelier crochet pattern by luba davies written in american crochet difficulty beginners chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet magic_ring rnd1 ch2 to count as 1st double_crochet 2dc into circle ch3 5dc into circle ch3 5dc into circle ch3 2dc into circle join with slip_stitch rnd2 single_crochet into 1st st half_double_crochet into next st 9dc into arch of ch3 of previous round double_crochet into next 2 sts half_double_crochet into next 3 sts 3hdc into middle arch of ch3 ch1 3hdc into the same arch half_double_crochet into next 3 sts double_crochet into next 2 sts 9dc into arch of ch3 half_double_crochet into next st single_crochet into last st join with slip_stitch fasten_off the end of pattern should you have any questions please fell free to contact me etsy shop http //www etsy com/shop/lubadaviesatelier blog http //crochetatelier blogspot com/ ravelry http //www ravelry com/projects/crochet-atelier facebook http //www facebook com/pages/luba-davies-atelier/101259253338726
